name: Egypt Adventure (itch)
description: A day ago, you were very happy with Akila, your love, when everything changed. They both walked to a large city in Egypt with the idea of buying gifts for the new King Horus. These afternoons on your wedding anniversary. However, in the city there has been something that will change the course of things. Seth, God of chaos, dessert and death, killed his brother Osiris and seized the crown of Egypt. The reign of Set brought death and pain to the inhabitants.  Akila was one of the unfortunates, the underworld claimed her and she took not only her body and soul, but also your broken heart. Since then, you decided to go for the treasure of the pyramid to give Anubis a good claim and that your wife can reach the world of the dead correctly.
